transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Hi sir Nidhi baat kar rahi hu senior manager India Mart se.
Executive: Shubham ji baat kar rahe ho na?
Customer: Haan ji. Haan ji mam.
Executive: Kaise ho Shubham ji aap? Mam kal call karega. Mam kal call kar lijiye aaj bahar hu mai.
Customer: Kal mai kitne baje connect karu sir aapko sham tak possible nahi ho payega?
Executive: Nahi mam aaj mai pura din bahar hu. Subah hi aaunga.
Customer: Sham ko 6 6:30 baje tak. Kyuki bas ek aapke feedback ka discussion karna tha aapne ek negative feedback diya tha na usi ke bare mein discussion karna tha.
Executive: Mam kal kal baat kar paunga mai.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Thik hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to discuss negative feedback given by him.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to connect in the evening.
- Customer wants to connect tomorrow.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will connect tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, discussion, connect
